title: Game Crash for MANY just now
body:
Me and most of my friends on league are currently stuck in game while having crashed. Im on the east coast NA so im not sure if this is regional or global, but I seen no one has said anything yet.

Please State your region, ty

replies.body: It's also affecting other modes like urf.
Norms crashing out now, not just ranked
Same, still can't get in 2 hours later...

RESTART YOUR PC

  YOUR PC DIDNT OPEN UP LEAGUE OF LEGEND PROPERLY SO IT SAID THAT. PLEASE GOSH RESTART YOUR PC AND IT SHOULD FIX IT!

> [{quoted}](name=Synu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qvjZEGb9,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2019-03-27T23:31:17.101+0000)
>
> RESTART YOUR PC
> 
>   YOUR PC DIDNT OPEN UP LEAGUE OF LEGEND PROPERLY SO IT SAID THAT. PLEASE GOSH RESTART YOUR PC AND IT SHOULD FIX 

Thats a little overboard
ssorry lol I copy and paste... and plus I was lazy to write it all
Just tried that and got into anther queue, it still happened. This is on Riot's side, and I hope they are fixing it right now.

In my case the game didn't even start while my friends entered it with no problem. 
This happened on EUNE server - I switched to EUW and tried to run custom game vs bots with my other account, no success.
Restarting the PC or deleting LoL processes in task manager and restarting LoL didn't help either.
During restart latest patch was reinstalled.

**SOLUTION **(at least it worked in my case):
In Lol client, go to Settings -> General -> Initiate Full Repair
Also happened on EUNE
Ranked promos game crashed... two people on the enemy team didn't disconnect and ended the game. No pause, nothing.
I did have 3 people in a 5v5 game mode afk or disconnect when you posted.
NA, just crashed out of two games but was able to speak in the postgame lobby and queue for another game.
I had this problem but I fixed it with hextech repair tool - force repatch {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

it happened to me in a ranked that we were winning and it kicked me and 2 other people out that were on my team, i still got reported here is the link skip to 1:16:00 . https://www.twitch.tv/videos/402172717?t=0h0m1s
Same
cmon riot
I tried playing Ranked. Didn't connect. Client says it's been taken down cuz of an issue. I try Norms. Same shit. Checked my firewall. All accepted. I better not lose any LP for this.
NA.
5 people left the game, 3 my team and 2 on enemy but no loss forgiven in ranked
just had 8 people dc in my last game
prob got flooded with mass login requests got hit with a login timer lol
yeah shit got fucked
yep +1
Yup same Rito hit the quan
same here, playing ranked game right now and having huge advantage, sad.
Game crashed for me in a ranked game. unable to reconnect to servers but im talking to friends on discord and typing this right now.
